channel.title: Help my phats are weriod colored
channel.description: Hello im using firescape v1 I figured out the coder of it made the phats and mask random colors and i liked how they were in the real rsc. Could someone help me or show me a link where i can figure out how to change there colors back. Please and thank you.

item.title: Help my phats are weriod colored
item.dc:creator: @ixl_p0tz_ixl ixl p0tz ixl
item.description:
@ixl_p0tz_ixl wrote:

use regualar divine client colors will change

Read full topic
item.source: Help my phats are weriod colored

item.title: Help my phats are weriod colored
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:13, topic:263701”]You want to change the in ItemDef.xml document in server side, then also decompress ItemDef.RSCD file from the client side, open it with wordpad and do the same there.

Compile them and replace overwriting your other ones. Make backups if you’re not 100% sure of what you’re doing.

You will also need to change it in the Animations.RSCD file too, decompress it and open with wordpad. Search for partyhat and you will see where to change the colours. This is also client side.

Here’s the original colours.

Red — 16711680
Yellow — 16776960
Green — 65280
Blue — 255
Magenta — 16711935
White — 0[/quote]

haha what an idiot.

Read full topic
item.source: Help my phats are weriod colored

item.title: Help my phats are weriod colored
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

You want to change the in ItemDef.xml document in server side, then also decompress ItemDef.RSCD file from the client side, open it with wordpad and do the same there.

Compile them and replace overwriting your other ones. Make backups if you’re not 100% sure of what you’re doing.

You will also need to change it in the Animations.RSCD file too, decompress it and open with wordpad. Search for partyhat and you will see where to change the colours. This is also client side.

Here’s the original colours.

Red — 16711680
Yellow — 16776960
Green — 65280
Blue — 255
Magenta — 16711935
White — 0

Read full topic
item.source: Help my phats are weriod colored

item.title: Help my phats are weriod colored
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

adu:

Actually, if you search the forums for a “def packer”, it will allow you to edit the .dmk files through an .xml file. So all you have to do is change the mask colour. There is absolutly nothing to do with sprites, just search for a def packer and your done.

Really damn then i took the wrong turn.

Read full topic

Hello im using firescape v1 I figured out the coder of it made the phats and mask random colors and i liked how they were in the real rsc. Could someone help me or show me a link where i can figure out how to change there colors back. Please and thank you.
[/quote]

Animations.dmk and Items.dmk in your client conf files.[/quote]
